name: Tanaman Anggrek
description: Anggrek adalah tanaman hias berbunga yang dikenal karena bunganya yang indah dan beragam.
recommendation: Watering: 2-3 times a week, ensuring the medium is dry before watering again.
Light: Indirect bright light, avoid direct sunlight.
Soil: Use a special orchid potting mix.
Fertilizing: Monthly with a balanced orchid fertilizer.

name: Aglonema
description: Aglonema adalah tanaman hias daun dengan daun yang bercorak indah dan mudah dirawat.
recommendation: Watering: Once a week.
Light: Low to medium indirect light.
Soil: Well-draining potting mix.
Fertilizing: Every 2-3 months with a balanced fertilizer.

name: Anthurium
description: Anthurium dikenal dengan bunganya yang berbentuk hati dan mengkilap.
recommendation: Watering: Keep soil slightly moist, water once the top inch of soil is dry.
Light: Bright, indirect light.
Soil: Use a well-draining potting mix.
Fertilizing: Every 6-8 weeks with a high-phosphorus fertilizer.

name: Adenium
description: Adenium, juga dikenal sebagai kamboja jepang, adalah tanaman sukulen dengan bunga berwarna cerah.
recommendation: Watering: Allow soil to dry out completely between waterings.
Light: Full sunlight.
Soil: Sandy, well-draining soil.
Fertilizing: Monthly during growing season with a balanced fertilizer.

name: Krisan
description: Krisan adalah tanaman hias berbunga dengan beragam warna dan bentuk bunga.
recommendation: Watering: Water when the top inch of soil is dry.
Light: Full sunlight to partial shade.
Soil: Well-draining soil rich in organic matter.
Fertilizing: Every 4-6 weeks with a balanced fertilizer.

name: Sedap malam
description: Sedap malam adalah tanaman hias berbunga dengan aroma yang wangi, biasanya digunakan dalam rangkaian bunga.
recommendation: Watering: Keep soil consistently moist.
Light: Full sunlight.
Soil: Well-draining soil rich in organic matter.
Fertilizing: Every 4-6 weeks during growing season.

name: Bromelia
description: Bromelia adalah tanaman hias dengan bentuk daun roset dan bunga yang eksotis.
recommendation: Watering: Fill the central cup with water and keep the soil lightly moist.
Light: Bright, indirect light.
Soil: Well-draining, light potting mix.
Fertilizing: Every 2-3 months with a diluted balanced fertilizer.

name: Euforbia
description: Euforbia adalah tanaman hias berduri dengan bunga kecil yang menarik.
recommendation: Watering: Water moderately, allowing the soil to dry out between waterings.
Light: Full sunlight to partial shade.
Soil: Well-draining soil.
Fertilizing: Every 2-3 months with a balanced fertilizer.

name: Kaktus
description: Kaktus adalah tanaman sukulen dengan berbagai bentuk dan ukuran yang tahan kekeringan.
recommendation: Watering: Water sparingly, about once every 2-3 weeks.
Light: Full sunlight.
Soil: Sandy, well-draining soil.
Fertilizing: Once a year with a cactus fertilizer.

name: Gladiol
description: Gladiol adalah tanaman hias berbunga dengan tangkai bunga tinggi dan bunga yang beragam warna.
recommendation: Watering: Keep soil moist during growing season.
Light: Full sunlight.
Soil: Well-draining soil rich in organic matter.
Fertilizing: Every 2-4 weeks during growing season.

name: Amarilis
description: Amarilis adalah tanaman hias berbunga dengan bunga besar yang mencolok.
recommendation: Watering: Water when the top inch of soil is dry.
Light: Bright, indirect light.
Soil: Well-draining soil.
Fertilizing: Every 4-6 weeks with a balanced fertilizer.

name: Mawar
description: Mawar adalah tanaman hias berbunga yang sangat populer dengan bunga yang indah dan harum.
recommendation: Watering: Water deeply once a week.
Light: Full sunlight.
Soil: Well-draining soil rich in organic matter.
Fertilizing: Every 4-6 weeks during growing season.

name: Begonia
description: Begonia adalah tanaman hias dengan daun dan bunga yang menarik.
recommendation: Watering: Water when the top inch of soil is dry.
Light: Bright, indirect light.
Soil: Well-draining soil.
Fertilizing: Every 2-4 weeks with a balanced fertilizer.

name: Bonsai
description: Bonsai adalah seni menanam pohon atau tanaman yang miniatur.
recommendation: Watering: Keep soil moist but not waterlogged.
Light: Full sunlight to partial shade.
Soil: Well-draining bonsai soil.
Fertilizing: Monthly during growing season with bonsai fertilizer.

name: Aster
description: Aster adalah tanaman berbunga dengan bunga kecil yang indah, biasanya mekar di akhir musim panas atau awal musim gugur.
recommendation: Watering: Water regularly to keep the soil moist.
Light: Full sunlight.
Soil: Well-draining soil rich in organic matter.
Fertilizing: Every 4-6 weeks during growing season.

name: Bayam – Bayaman
description: Bayam – Bayaman adalah tanaman yang dikenal dengan daun berwarna-warni yang menarik.
recommendation: Watering: Keep soil consistently moist.
Light: Full sunlight to partial shade.
Soil: Well-draining soil.
Fertilizing: Monthly with a balanced fertilizer.

name: Jawer ayam
description: Jawer ayam adalah tanaman hias dengan bunga berbentuk unik dan warna-warni cerah.
recommendation: Watering: Water when the top inch of soil is dry.
Light: Full sunlight.
Soil: Well-draining soil.
Fertilizing: Every 4-6 weeks with a balanced fertilizer.

name: Marginata
description: Marginata adalah tanaman hias dengan daun panjang yang berwarna hijau dengan tepi merah.
recommendation: Watering: Water when the top inch of soil is dry.
Light: Bright, indirect light.
Soil: Well-draining potting mix.
Fertilizing: Every 2-3 months with a balanced fertilizer.

name: Krokot
description: Krokot adalah tanaman hias dengan bunga kecil yang cerah dan dapat tumbuh di kondisi yang kurang ideal.
recommendation: Watering: Water sparingly, drought-tolerant.
Light: Full sunlight.
Soil: Sandy, well-draining soil.
Fertilizing: Rarely needed, once during the growing season.

name: Dahlia
description: Dahlia adalah tanaman hias berbunga dengan bunga besar dan berwarna-warni.
recommendation: Watering: Keep soil consistently moist.
Light: Full sunlight.
Soil: Well-draining soil rich in organic matter.
Fertilizing: Every 2-4 weeks during growing season.

name: Lili
description: Lili adalah tanaman hias berbunga dengan bunga besar yang indah dan harum.
recommendation: Watering: Keep soil moist during growing season.
Light: Full sunlight to partial shade.
Soil: Well-draining soil rich in organic matter.
Fertilizing: Every 4-6 weeks during growing season.

name: Anyelir
description: Anyelir adalah tanaman hias berbunga dengan bunga yang beraneka warna dan harum.
recommendation: Watering: Keep soil moist but not waterlogged.
Light: Full sunlight.
Soil: Well-draining soil.
Fertilizing: Every 4-6 weeks during growing season.

name: Kenikir

recommendation: Watering: Water when the top inch of soil is dry.
Light: Full sunlight.
Soil: Well-draining soil.
Fertilizing: Every 2-3 months with a balanced fertilizer.

Light: Bright, indirect light.
Soil: Well-draining soil.
Fertilizing: Every 2-3 months with a balanced fertilizer.

Soil: Well-draining soil rich in organic matter.
Fertilizing: Every 2-3 months with a balanced fertilizer.
